Package frc.math

Class Pose2d

  • java.lang.Object
    • frc.math.Pose2d
  • public class Pose2d
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a 2d pose (rigid transform) containing translational and rotational elements.

    Inspired by Sophus (https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/tree/master/sophus)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected static Pose2d kIdentity  
      protected Rotation2d rotation_  
      protected Translation2d translation_  

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Pose2d()
      Construct a new Pose2d from a Translation2d centered at (0,0) and a new non-normalized Rotation2d with magnitude (1,0)
      Pose2d​(double x, double y, Rotation2d rotation)
      Construct a new Pose2d, given a current x,y position and a previous Rotation2d
      Pose2d​(Pose2d other)
      Construct a new Pose2d given an old Pose2d
      Pose2d​(Translation2d translation, Rotation2d rotation)
      Construct a new Pose2d given a old Translation2d and Rotation2d

      Do twist interpolation of this pose assuming constant curvature.
      Translation2d intersection​(Pose2d other)

      Pose2d inverse()
      The inverse of this transform "undoes" the effect of translating by this transform.

      Return true if this pose is (nearly) colinear with the another.

      Transform this' Pose2d by another Pose2d This means first translating by other.translation and then rotating by other.rotation

        public static Pose2d fromTranslation​(Translation2d translation)
        Return a Pose2d given a transation. Rotation is set to the default value.
        Parameters:
        translation - the translation of the Pose
        Returns:
        a Pose2d given a translation.

      • fromRotation

        Return a new Pose2d given a rotation, with a Transation2d of (0,0)

      • exp

        public static Pose2d exp​(Twist2d delta)
        Obtain a new Pose2d from a (constant curvature) velocity. See: https://github.com/strasdat/Sophus/blob/master/sophus/se2.hpp

        This would probubly be useful for Pure Persuit

        Parameters:
        delta - Twist2d
        Returns:
        delta pose of the robot interpolated from the twist 2d

      • transformBy

        public Pose2d transformBy​(Pose2d other)
        Transform this' Pose2d by another Pose2d This means first translating by other.translation and then rotating by other.rotation
        Parameters:
        other - The other transform.
        Returns:
        This transform * other

      • inverse

        public Pose2d inverse()
        The inverse of this transform "undoes" the effect of translating by this transform.
        Returns:
        The opposite of this transform.

      • intersection

        public Translation2d intersection​(Pose2d other)
        Finds the point where the heading of this pose intersects the heading of another. Returns (+INF, +INF) if parallel.
